name: Instant Pixel Palette Scramble
description:
Instant Pixel Palette Scramble! v1.01 - Release Notes

Made for the OpenGameArt Game Jam Summer 2017
Created with art from: 
4 x 2D Art assets from OGA
2 x Music assets from OGA
5 x SoundFX assets from OGA

System Requirements:
Windows PC
Microsoft .NET Framework vers 4.0 (or better)
OpenGL 3.0 Compatible Video Card
   Nvidia GeForce 8000 series or better
   Ati Radeon HD 2000 series or better
   Intel HD 4500 or better
   You can check specific cards at:
   http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comparison_of_Nvidia_graphics_processing_units
   http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comparison_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units
   http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comparison_of_Intel_graphics_processing_units
100mb Free Hard Drive Space
Mouse
Keyboard

Objective -
Swap colors on the sprite until order has been restored!

Controls -
Click any two colors to swap them.
You can click on the image or the color swatches on the left side of the screen.

Scoring -
Color Corretion
Swap one color into the correct pixels - 100 points

Color Corretion Combo
Swap two colors into the correct pixels at once - 300 points

Keyboard Shortcuts -
escape - quit game

Change Log:
v1.01 -
Proper credit for cloud background art added.  
Sincere Apologies to Dan Ryder for missing this in v1.0!
 
v1.00 -
First release.

Instant Pixel Palette Scramble! is Copyright Scott Matott 2017.  All rights reserved.
